name: Knight Hopper
description:
During battle you had your legs chopped off by a demon and are now forced to deliver slime's to him through portals.

[Arrow Keys to move and hop]

Made by: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClR2bM3bxOHTuw5q6O27Czw
